metadata.name: META-511 - Certificate Mint Pass - Fall 2022 #1/840
metadata.description:
This is the mint pass to META-511: NFTs and the Metaverse Fall 2022 Course Certificate.

META-511 is a MOOC offered by the University of Nicosia (UNIC) and is the world's first university course delivered on-chain and in the metaverse.

If you have successfully completed the META-511 final exam with a passing grade (>=60/100), you will be eligible to claim this mint pass, which you will then be able to burn in order to redeem the official course certificate.

attributes.value: Passing grade on META-511 final exam (>=60/100)
